topics.body:
I think I've figured it out.
Seventy percent of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure is the characters and the audience screaming "WHAT THE FUCK IS GOING ON!"
Fifteen percent is the characters and the audience going "Oooohhhh THAT'S what the fuck was going on."
The final fifteen percent is the characters going "time to stop whateve the fuck is going on" and the audience going "YEAH!"
